title: Ministry of Revenue Overview
source_body: This module provides an overview of the Ministry of Revenue of Ethiopia.
original_text: Amharic translation of: This module provides an overview of the Ministry of Revenue of Ethiopia....
translated_text: This module provides an overview of the Ministry of Revenue of Ethiopia.

description.en: Visit the Ministry of Revenue website
description.am: ወደ የገቢ ሚኒስቴር ድህረ ገጽ ይሂዱ

question.en: What services does the Ministry of Revenue provide?

answer.en: The Ministry of Revenue oversees tax collection, customs administration, and revenue policy development.
answer.am: የገቢ ሚኒስቴር የትክስ ስብሰባ, የክስተት አስተዳደር እና የገቢ ፖሊሲ እድገትን ይቆጣጠራል።
